requirements.requirement_text: "Organization.type SHALL be present [...] and SHALL have a cardinality of 1..1"
"Organization.type SHALL be bound to the NetworkTypeVS value set with a required binding strength"
"Organization.partOf SHALL be present [...] and SHALL have a cardinality of 1..1"
"Organization.partOf SHALL reference a Plan-Net Organization resource"
"Organization.contact.telecom.system SHALL be present if Organization.contact.telecom is present"
"Organization.contact.telecom.value SHALL be present if Organization.contact.telecom is present"
"Organization.endpoint SHALL reference a Plan-Net Endpoint resource if present"
"Implement the RESTful behavior according to the FHIR specification."
"Support json source formats for all Plan-Net interactions."
"Identify the Plan-Net profiles supported as part of the FHIR `meta.profile` attribute for each instance."
"Support the searchParameters on each profile individually and in combination."
"Support forward and reverse chaining on all search parameters that specify the 'chain' property"
"Support xml source formats for all Plan-Net interactions."
requirements.source: FHIR RESTful Capabilities section, SHOULD items, item 1

requirements.requirement_text: "See the [General Security Considerations](implementation.html#general-security-considerations) section for requirements and recommendations."
"A server SHALL reject any unauthorized requests by returning an `HTTP 401` unauthorized response code."
"A Server SHALL be capable of returning a [Resource] resource using:
requirements.source: Fetch and Search Criteria section for each resource type

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHOULD be capable of returning a [Resource] resource using:
requirements.source: Fetch and Search Criteria section for each resource type

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _includes: [list of _includes for each resource]"
requirements.source: Fetch and Search Criteria section for each resource type

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _revincludes: [list of _revincludes for each resource]"
requirements.source: Fetch and Search Criteria section for each resource type

requirements.requirement_text: "A Server SHALL support the search parameters listed in the 'Search Parameter Summary' table for each resource type."
requirements.source: Search Parameter Summary table for each resource type

requirements.requirement_text: "The status element SHALL be present and have a fixed value of 'active'"
requirements.source: Location.status element, min cardinality changed to 1 and fixed value set to "active"

requirements.requirement_text: "The mode element SHALL NOT be present"
requirements.source: Location.mode element, max cardinality set to 0

requirements.requirement_text: "If present, the managingOrganization element SHALL reference a Plan-Net Organization resource"
"If present, the partOf element SHALL reference a Plan-Net Location resource"
"If present, the endpoint element SHALL reference a Plan-Net Endpoint resource"
"The Location resource SHALL have a status element with a value of 'active'"
"The Location resource SHALL have a name element"
"The Location resource SHALL have an address element with at least a state sub-element"
"The Location resource SHALL have an extension element with a url of 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/location-boundary-geojson'"
"The location-boundary-geojson extension SHALL have a valueAttachment element with a contentType of 'application/json'"
"The location-boundary-geojson extension SHALL have a valueAttachment element with a data element containing a base64-encoded GeoJSON representation of the location boundary"
"The Location resource SHOULD have a text element with a status of 'extensions' and a div element containing a human-readable representation of the location information"
"The 'type' extension SHALL NOT have any extensions"
"The 'type' extension SHALL have a url with fixed value 'type'"
"The 'type' extension SHALL have a value of type CodeableConcept"
"The 'type' extension value SHALL be bound to the DeliveryMethodVS value set"
requirements.source: Extension.extension:type.value[x] element, binding strength: required, valueSet: "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ValueSet/DeliveryMethodVS"

requirements.requirement_text: "Extension MAY have zero or more 'virtualModalities' extensions"
"The 'virtualModalities' extension SHALL NOT have any extensions"
"The 'virtualModalities' extension SHALL have a url with fixed value 'virtualModalities'"
"The 'virtualModalities' extension SHALL have a value of type CodeableConcept"
"The 'virtualModalities' extension value SHOULD be bound to the VirtualModalitiesVS value set"
"The Extension SHALL have a url with fixed value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/delivery-method'"
"The Extension SHALL NOT have a value[x] element"
"Extension SHALL have an extension element with sliceName 'type'"
"Extension.extension:type SHALL NOT have any extension elements"
"Extension.extension:type.url SHALL have a fixed URI value of 'type'"
"Extension.extension:type.value[x] SHOULD be bound to the 'Endpoint Usecases VS' value set with extensible binding strength"
"Extension MAY have an extension element with sliceName 'standard'"
requirements.source: Extension.extension:standard element, min cardinality of 0 and max cardinality of 1

requirements.requirement_text: "Extension.extension:standard SHALL NOT have any extension elements"
"Extension.extension:standard.url SHALL have a fixed URI value of 'standard'"
"Extension.extension:standard.value[x] SHALL be present when Extension.extension:standard is used"
"Extension.url SHALL have a fixed URI value of 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/endpoint-usecase'"
"Extension SHALL NOT have a value[x] element"
"The HealthcareServiceTypeVS ValueSet SHALL use version 4.0.1 of the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/service-type code system."
"The HealthcareServiceTypeVS ValueSet SHALL include the code '1' with display 'Adoption/Permanent Care Info/Support' from the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/service-type code system."
"The HealthcareServiceTypeVS ValueSet SHALL include the code '3' with display 'Aged Care Information/Referral' from the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/service-type code system."
"The HealthcareServiceTypeVS ValueSet SHALL include the code '8' with display 'Home Care/Housekeeping Assistance' from the http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/service-type code system."
"The IndividualAndGroupSpecialtiesVS value set SHALL include 669 concepts from the NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy code system"
"Systems implementing the IndividualAndGroupSpecialtiesVS value set SHALL use version 20.2 of the NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy code system"
"The IndividualAndGroupSpecialtiesVS value set SHALL have a status of 'active'"
"The IndividualAndGroupSpecialtiesVS value set SHALL have a title of 'Individual and Group Specialties'"
"Each InsurancePlan.plan should have a distinct plan.type."
"The 'status' extension SHALL NOT have any nested extensions"
"The 'status' extension SHALL have a url of 'status'"
"The 'status' extension SHALL have a value of type 'code'"
"The 'status' extension SHALL have a fixed code value of 'active'"
"The 'status' extension SHALL use a code from the 'Qualification Status VS' value set"
"The extension MAY have zero or more 'whereValid' extensions"
"The 'whereValid' extension SHALL NOT have any nested extensions"
"The 'whereValid' extension SHALL have a url of 'whereValid'"
"The 'whereValid' extension SHALL have a value of type 'CodeableConcept' or 'Reference'"
"If the 'whereValid' extension uses a Reference, it SHALL reference a Plan-Net Location"
"If the 'whereValid' extension uses a CodeableConcept, it SHALL use a code from the 'USPS Two Letter Alphabetic Codes' value set"
"The extension SHALL have a url of 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/practitioner-qualification'"
"The extension SHALL NOT have a value element"
"Extension.extension:acceptingPatients.value[x] SHALL have a minimum cardinality of 1"
"Extension.extension:acceptingPatients.value[x] SHALL be bound to the AcceptingPatientsVS value set with a required binding strength"
"Extension.extension:fromNetwork.value[x] SHALL have a minimum cardinality of 1"
"Extension.extension:fromNetwork.value[x] SHALL be of type Reference(Plan-Net Network)"
"Extension.extension:characteristics.value[x] SHALL have a minimum cardinality of 1"
"Extension.url SHALL be fixed to the value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition/newpatients'"
"If no new patients are accepted, no characteristics are allowed"

requirements.conformance: N/A (this is a change description, not a requirement)
